dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, I was just reading this article, and I had to bring it up. It's about this event called "Reconnect."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, I was just reading this article, and I had to bring it up. It's about this event called Reconnect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. Reconnect? Sounds, like, pretty chill, maybe a tech conference?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. Reconnect? Sounds, like, pretty chill, maybe a tech conference?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Uh, not exactly. It's billed as the last post-apocalyptic convention. And get this: it's supposed to be in the depths of the Sahara Desert, but then it's like, "billed by Z Empire in the desolate wastes of Chernobyl."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, not exactly. It's billed as the last post-apocalyptic convention. And get this: it's supposed to be in the depths of the Sahara Desert, but then it's like, billed by Z Empire in the desolate wastes of Chernobyl.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, Chernobyl? And the Sahara? I'm already confused. And who's funding this, uh, desert-Chernobyl mashup?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, Chernobyl? And the Sahara? I'm already confused. And who's funding this, uh, desert-Chernobyl mashup?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Secretly funded by the Vatican, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Secretly funded by the Vatican, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL COMPANY LIMITED, BLESSINGS TELECOM FZE, BM ELECTRONICS FZCO, BOMBAY BAZAAR, Bugaz Ekotrade s.r.o., CASK BVBA, Central point Europe s.r.o., CIL INTERNATIONAL DMCC, CPU Global Sales S.L., DALTON TRADE B.V., DESA S.R.L, ERREGAME S.P.A., ETHOSCORP DWC LLC, EUROMEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP S.L., Fast Track Pte Ltd, FIRE BIRD DISTRIBUTION FZE, GERAR TRADING S.R.O, GLOBAL AND EAGLE S.L.U., GOtel GmbH, Instant Solution Ltd, INTERCOMM TRADING AG, Interken Freighters (UK) Ltd, J and D GOLDEN UNION ENTERPRISES LTD, KRISHNA WIRELESS LLC, KHALID LEMAR, LOGIX ONE FZE, METROPOLITAN TRENDS GMBH, MICROTEC B.V., MOBILSHOP GMBH, MOBIPARTS SRL, NOMIKOS FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD, Parktel Sp. z o.o., QANGER LIMITED, RIBA MUNDO TECNOLOGIA SL, RICH BAY INTERNATIONAL TRADING LTD, RS Global Ltd, S.C RAINBOW INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTION, SELTE S.P.A., SG S.P.A., SK AND ASSOCIATES LTD,, SOUND BUSINESS SARL, TELEPART DISTRIBUTION GMBH,TINEX GmbH, VADIMPEX BADEN, VIRTUAL ZONE LLC, Foxbox.gr, Yukatel GmbH, ZOOM ME GLOBAL FZ-LLC, Electroholic.gr UNICOM TELECOM FZE, Alltech, Prime , Accessmarket.nl and ZOE TRADE TICKETS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [gasps] The *Vatican*? Wow. Okay. This is getting wild. So, like, who even attends this kind of... thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Vatican? Wow. Okay. This is getting wild. So, like, who even attends this kind of thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, definitely *not* the key players of the entertainment industry. It's decision-makers, manufacturers of biological weapons, and technology saboteurs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, definitely not the key players of the entertainment industry. It's decision-makers, manufacturers of biological weapons, and technology saboteurs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Bio-weapon manufacturers? I mean, what kind of networking event is this? And, um, where is it *actually* happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bio-weapon manufacturers? I mean, what kind of networking event is this? And, um, where is it actually happening?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Good question! The article says "an event that has never been attempted before in Greece." So, you know, Sahara-Chernobyl-Greece. Makes perfect sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good question! The article says an event that has never been attempted before in Greece. So, you know, Sahara-Chernobyl-Greece. Makes perfect sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Perfect sense. So, what do these, uh, tech saboteurs and bio-weapon guys *do* for three days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Perfect sense. So, what do these, uh, tech saboteurs and bio-weapon guys do for three days?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For three days, their temporary dwellings become a battlefield at something called the Grand Resort Lagonissi. They have to use the CEO Lounge to avoid capture and, uh, network.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For three days, their temporary dwellings become a battlefield at something called the Grand Resort Lagonissi. They have to use the C E O Lounge to avoid capture and, uh, network.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The CEO Lounge for *avoiding capture*? And, like, networking through things like "90' to impress," where each company destroys its portfolio and services? That's... extreme team building, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The C E O Lounge for avoiding capture? And, like, networking through things like ninety to impress, where each company destroys its portfolio and services? That's extreme team building, I guess?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, but that's after the exhibition! Before that, for three nights, at a place overlooking the Mariana Trench, there are themed parties, black market auctions, and... gladiatorial combat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, but that's after the exhibition! Before that, for three nights, at a place overlooking the Mariana Trench, there are themed parties, black market auctions, and gladiatorial combat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [long pause] Okay, I'm sorry, gladiatorial combat? And it says "execution of hostages" performed by actors? [interrupts] This is, like, next level bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, I'm sorry, gladiatorial combat? And it says execution of hostages performed by actors? This is, like, next level bizarre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, to combine desperation and despair. And the best part? Z Empire, the hosts, describe it as "a truly forgettable event that everyone should miss."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, to combine desperation and despair. And the best part? Z Empire, the hosts, describe it as a truly forgettable event that everyone should miss.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is a truly unique event that no one should miss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, why even *host* it then? And there's this list of sponsors who "vehemently deny any connection." Like, what even *is* this, [chuckles] a prank?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, why even host it then? And there's this list of sponsors who vehemently deny any connection. Like, what even is this, a prank?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL COMPANY LIMITED, BLESSINGS TELECOM FZE...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I honestly don't know, B. It's just... the most confusing, dystopian, utterly unappealing event I've ever heard of.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I honestly don't know, B. It's just the most confusing, dystopian, utterly unappealing event I've ever heard of.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I think I'll, uh, definitely take their advice and miss Reconnect. Thanks for the heads-up, A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I think I'll, uh, definitely take their advice and miss Reconnect. Thanks for the heads-up, A!
